The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an abandoned missle silo with bodies all over and one of the miners is immediately attacked. It's clear that they haven't come under attack from the kidnapper, but a preacher detained in the prison who is there for preaching hate to interracial couples.
